languages.text: "Я выстрелила прежде, чем даже успела до конца осознать происходящее. Свет Терры направил мою руку, не иначе, потому что больше одного выстрела не понадобилось. Залп автопистолета уничтожил артефакт Архиврага вместе с черным сердцем его владелицы. Но..."

traits.locale_text: "Я выстрелила прежде, чем даже успела до конца осознать происходящее. Свет Терры направил мою руку, не иначе, потому что больше одного выстрела не понадобилось. Залп болтера уничтожил артефакт Хаоса вместе с черным сердцем его владелицы. Но..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I fired before I could even fully comprehend what I was seeing. Terra's light must have guided my hand, for one shot was all it took. The autopistol's burst destroyed both the Archenemy's artefact and its owner's black heart. But..."
languages.original_text: "Я выстрелила прежде, чем даже успела до конца осознать происходящее. Свет Терры направил мою руку, не иначе, потому что больше одного выстрела не понадобилось. Залп автопистолета уничтожил артефакт Архиврага вместе с черным сердцем его владелицы. Но..."

traits.locale_text: "I fired before I could even fully comprehend what I was seeing. Terra's light must have guided my hand, for one shot was all it took. The autopistol's burst destroyed both the Archenemy's artefact and its owner's black heart. But..."

"I fired before I could even fully comprehend what I was seeing. Terra's light must have guided my hand, for one shot was all it took. The autopistol's burst destroyed both the Archenemy's artefact and its owner's black heart. But..."

languages.text: 「私は自分が見ているものを完全に理解しない内に撃った。地球の光が私の手を導いたのね。ボルターの一撃は、渾沌の勢力のアーティファクトとその持ち主の黒い心臓を破壊した。だけど…」
languages.original_text: "I fired before I could even fully comprehend what I was seeing. Terra's light must have guided my hand, for one shot was all it took. The bolter discharge destroyed both the Archenemy's artefact and its owner's black heart. But..."

traits.locale_text: 「私は自分が見ているものを完全に理解しない内に撃った。地球の光が私の手を導いたのね。ボルターの一撃は、渾沌の勢力のアーティファクトとその持ち主の黒い心臓を破壊した。だけど…」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我还没能完全理解眼前的景象，就立刻开了枪。我肯定得到了泰拉之光的指引，因为我只开了一枪，自动手枪射出的枪弹就摧毁了那件混沌大敌的造物，消灭了它邪恶的主人，然而……”
languages.original_text: "I fired before I could even fully comprehend what I was seeing. Terra's light must have guided my hand, for one shot was all it took. The autopistol's burst destroyed both the Archenemy's artefact and its owner's black heart. But..."

traits.locale_text: “我还没能完全理解眼前的景象，就立刻开了枪。我肯定得到了泰拉之光的指引，因为我只开了一枪，自动手枪射出的枪弹就摧毁了那件混沌大敌的造物，消灭了它邪恶的主人，然而……”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Disparé antes de comprender lo que estaba viendo. La luz de Terra debió de guiar mi mano, pues bastó con un disparo. La ráfaga de la pistola automática destruyó tanto el artefacto del Archienemigo como el corazón negro de su dueña. Pero...».
languages.original_text: "I fired before I could even fully comprehend what I was seeing. Terra's light must have guided my hand, for one shot was all it took. The autopistol's burst destroyed both the Archenemy's artefact and its owner's black heart. But..."

traits.locale_text: «Disparé antes de comprender lo que estaba viendo. La luz de Terra debió de guiar mi mano, pues bastó con un disparo. La ráfaga de la pistola automática destruyó tanto el artefacto del Archienemigo como el corazón negro de su dueña. Pero...».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe gefeuert, bevor ich begriffen hatte, was ich da sehe. Das Licht Terras muss meine Hand geführt haben, denn ein Schuss hat gereicht. Die Salve aus der Autopistole hat das Artefakt des Erzfeindes und das schwarze Herz seiner Besitzerin zerstört. Aber ..."
languages.original_text: "I fired before I could even fully comprehend what I was seeing. Terra's light must have guided my hand, for one shot was all it took. The autopistol's burst destroyed both the Archenemy's artefact and its owner's black heart. But..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe gefeuert, bevor ich begriffen hatte, was ich da sehe. Das Licht Terras muss meine Hand geführt haben, denn ein Schuss hat gereicht. Die Salve aus der Autopistole hat das Artefakt des Erzfeindes und das schwarze Herz seiner Besitzerin zerstört. Aber ..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai tiré avant même de saisir toutes les implications de ce que je venais de voir. Ma main a sûrement été guidée par la lumière de Terra, car un seul tir a suffi. La salve de pistolet-mitrailleur a détruit d'un seul coup l'artefact du Grand Ennemi et le cœur corrompu de sa propriétaire. Mais... »
languages.original_text: "I fired before I could even fully comprehend what I was seeing. Terra's light must have guided my hand, for one shot was all it took. The autopistol's burst destroyed both the Archenemy's artefact and its owner's black heart. But..."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai tiré avant même de saisir toutes les implications de ce que je venais de voir. Ma main a sûrement été guidée par la lumière de Terra, car un seul tir a suffi. La salve de pistolet-mitrailleur a détruit d'un seul coup l'artefact du Grand Ennemi et le cœur corrompu de sa propriétaire. Mais... »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Gözlerimin gördüğünü idrak edemeden silahımı ateşledim. Terra'nın nuru elime rehber olmuş olacak ki tek atışta haini geberttim. Ototabancamla yaptığım atış, hem Şerbaşı'nın eserini hem de sahibinin kara yüreğini yok etti. Lakin..."
languages.original_text: "I fired before I could even fully comprehend what I was seeing. Terra's light must have guided my hand, for one shot was all it took. The autopistol's burst destroyed both the Archenemy's artefact and its owner's black heart. But..."
